NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 PLUME: Friends, I shall be leaving for Ember Twin soon, ahead of your travels. I wish you all the best on your expedition to the Quantum Moon. 2 1 MELORAE: Oh, Plume! Have you heard of the new suits made by Oeno? You must don them before you depart! 3 2 MELORAE: The expedition team to the forested planet discovered a new type of ore which appears to have fantastically heat-resistant properties. 4 3 MELORAE: Oeno was able to integrate these new materials into our spacesuits, greatly improving their durability and insulative properties. 5 3 MELORAE: As there is little shelter on Ember Twin's south pole, I hope this new suit should make the heat from the sun far more bearable during your visit! 6 5 COLEUS: Imagine if we had such wondrous equipment when we were stranded on Ember Twin, Melorae. 7 6 MELORAE: Then I imagine we might begin to miss the sun's warmth on this stormy, sunless planet - which I have not! 8 7 PLUME: You have my gratitude, Melorae. I shall indeed seek one of these suits before my departure. LC_G R4 2 LC_G R5 2 LC_G EX1 1 LC_G EX2 2 LC_G EX3 3 SF Jelly EX1 3 SF Jelly EX2 3 SF Jelly EX3 3
